architecture_summary.pattern: Single Page Application (frontend) + serverless edge functions

frontend.components: React components (TSX) under src/components and src/imports
key_features: Product catalog and product detail pages
UI primitives adapted from Radix and custom UI in src/components/ui

architecture_summary.data_store: Supabase (Postgres) - accessed by edge functions and client SDK
architecture_summary.assets: public/assets and src/assets (figma image aliases in vite.config.ts)

high_level_flow: User opens SPA -> React components initialize -> useFaceTracking hooks attach camera and mediapipe/tf models
On visitor arrival, client invokes Supabase edge function 'track-visitor' to record visitor metadata
Try-on events call 'track-try-on' and other analytics functions
Static product data read from public/config/products.json and displayed in UI

observations: Project depends on many open-source libraries for UI (Radix), state and tooling (Vite, TypeScript), and ML (TensorFlow.js, MediaPipe).
Supabase functions import third-party modules directly from Deno CDN endpoints.
Vite config includes an environment default value for SUPABASE keys; those values have been redacted in this audit summary â€” do not include secrets in legal submissions without explicit consent.
recommendation: Collect LICENSE files for each dependency used in distribution and bundle third-party notices per NRDC submission requirements.
Verify that included third-party assets (images from Figma or other design files) have appropriate rights or attributions.

originality_assessment.summary: The majority of application-specific business logic, UI composition, and try-on algorithms appear authored within this repository (src/). The project relies on multiple third-party libraries and frameworks for low-level functionality.

open_items_and_next_steps: Provide applicant full name to finalize Author/Ownership declarations in NRDC documents.
Confirm whether any files are derived/copied from external closed-source vendors (design assets, paid SDKs).
Collect explicit LICENSE copy for project (LICENSE file) and third-party attribution files before submission.
